epidemic.simulation

Class View

  • java.lang.Object
    • epidemic.simulation.View
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer, java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.util.EventListener

    public class View
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer, java.awt.event.ActionListener
    View class in MVC model. This class represent GUI and create frames and panels This class implement Observer interface for get update from model and implement ActionListener interface for button actions Use MyCanvas class for create 1000*600 panel and paint individual on this canvas
    Author:
    EMRE KAVAK

      • update

        public void update(int societyCount,
                   int wearMaskCount,
                   int notWearMaskCount,
                   int infected,
                   int healthy,
                   int hospitalized,
                   int dead,
                   double r,
                   double z,
                   double aveD)
        Observer method for update canvas. Model call this method when update happen
        Specified by:
        update in interface Observer
        Parameters:
        societyCount - society count
        wearMaskCount - wearing mask individual count
        notWearMaskCount - not wearing mask individual count
        infected - infected count
        healthy - healthy count
        hospitalized - sent hospital count
        dead - dead count
        r - double
        z - double
